title: How to unsubscribe from Polsat Box Go
description: Learn how to cancel your Polsat Box Go subscription through their website, Google Play Store, iOS App Store, or your mobile operator.

web.title: Cancel Polsat Box Go Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Polsat Box Go subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to polsatboxgo.pl and log in to your account.
*   Navigate to 'Moje dostÄ™py' (My Access).
*   Select the specific Polsat Box Go package you wish to cancel.
*   Click the 'Zrezygnuj' (Cancel) button next to the package.
*   Confirm your cancellation by clicking 'OK'.
*   Check the confirmation message to verify that recurring access has been disabled.
*   Note the date until which the canceled package remains valid.

seo_text: Cancel Polsat Box Go subscription, Polsat Box Go unsubscribe, end Polsat Box Go membership, Polsat Box Go cancellation guide, stop Polsat Box Go payments.
